“Here you go, a new body for you. And it just so happens to be one of those humans who had stopped us before. “But she’s a girl. Couldn’t you find a guy for me?” You say pouting, although it looks both terrifying and adorable in your new body.

“I feel great!” You say you look your new body and outfit over. “It feels like my body has been squeezed into every nook and cranny of this one.”

“Good, I’m gonna leave now and go turn the rest of the humans on this island into meatsuits for my people to wear, so my race can finally rule the world! You’re free to help or do your own thing, just make sure to stay out of my way.” He says as he snatches the daemon ritus and runs of out of the cave.

“Hmm. What should I do now?” you say as you leave the cave.
